channel.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
channel.description:
This is my opinion on mw3
1:the addon killstreak is gonna be gay 2: I'm glad they are bringing back quickscoping 3; WTF NO NUKE??? 4: WHY THE HE'LL DO I HAVE TO PAY FOR LIVE AND LIVE ON MW3!
Might get it might not.. What's ur opinion?
And my other question? Ps3 or xbox. = [xbox]

item.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:147, topic:414519”]Believe it or not, Mincecraft was accidentally stylized and became popular because of its graphics. That argument is no longer true, minecraft isn’t an example. Minecraft generally looks simplistic and appealing. If minecraft was DIRT FUCKING UGLY and 3m people still played it it would an example.

Graphics are important because it is the first thing people see, it sells your game before the gameplay does, which is excellent because graphics rarely effect gameplay because they’re in two different studio departments.[/quote]

Thats why they call you the “graphics master”

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Believe it or not, Mincecraft was accidentally stylized and became popular because of its graphics. That argument is no longer true, minecraft isn’t an example. Minecraft generally looks simplistic and appealing. If minecraft was DIRT FUCKING UGLY and 3m people still played it it would an example.

Graphics are important because it is the first thing people see, it sells your game before the gameplay does, which is excellent because graphics rarely effect gameplay because they’re in two different studio departments.

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:145, topic:414519”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=516486.msg3749067#msg3749067 date=1315882148]
PS3 100% of the way, free online better graphics built in bluray player. Tbh there is no comparison anymore.
[/quote]

comparing graphics
consoles

don’t compare them, they both produce horrendous graphics. graphics don’t make up a game, either.[/quote]

MINECRAFT IS AN EXAMPLE++!

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:143, topic:414519”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=516486.msg3758639#msg3758639 date=1316693676]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=516486.msg3758632#msg3758632 date=1316691014]

Wow… just rename the title of this topic to CoDs Cons. You guys say it takes no skill, 3v1 anyone here and I bet I’ll win
[/quote]My sister might be able to beat you in quick scopes. She’s already mopped the floor with some of my friends quickscoping in a 1v4.

And she’s 13, too. Been asked to join a lot of clans.

Gamertag, I’ll set her straight. Also Kracky that’s why they invented toggle mute my friend
[/quote]My friends also aren’t exactly the best quickscopers I can ask her if she’d like to, but she’s been busy with sports and school work. She hasn’t played MW2 in weeks :|[/quote]
ill 1v1

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:135, topic:414519”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=516486.msg3758625#msg3758625 date=1316690333]

Wow… just rename the title of this topic to CoDs Cons. You guys say it takes no skill, 3v1 anyone here and I bet I’ll win

If it’s not quickscoping 3 would probably win. You’d have to be hella quiet.
[/quote]
It’s quickscoping. I’m just pretty fed up with people bagging on cod because it’s no so realistic. Well fuck realistic! Was Pac-Man realistic? Was Mario, Zelda or Space Invaders?[/quote]
I think I’ve played with you before. If you’re who I think you are, you have a massive advantage with your walmart 1bar lagfest connection.

Read full topic

item.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Wow… just rename the title of this topic to CoDs Cons. You guys say it takes no skill, 3v1 anyone here and I bet I’ll win

The only skill is timing and awareness, any 7 year old can develop that by simply playing that game.

item.description:

If it’s not quickscoping 3 would probably win. You’d have to be hella quiet.
[/quote]
It’s quickscoping. I’m just pretty fed up with people bagging on cod because it’s no so realistic. Well fuck realistic! Was Pac-Man realistic? Was Mario, Zelda or Space Invaders?[/quote]Tabby you’re right, There weren’t but they also weren’t first person shooters. I would prefer if at least the gun where realistic and if most of the player didn’t blow out my ear drums when they screamed various things like, “OOOOOOOO YEAHHHH SUCK IT SUCK IT LOLOL BITCH GOT OWNEDDDD”(In the voice of a 11year old British guy with the flu). No offence to 11year old Brits.

item.description:

[quote=“reyx7, post:130, topic:414519”]I love how i hard helicopters are to use… keeps idiots like myself out of them. In cod it’s all just AI.[/quote]Me and my friend Brian use the helicopter like is a tank or something, But I couldn’t fly the thing if I tried and he is Asian so that’s why he is good, Like Corey.

and TabbyKiller that’s the point, 1 person really shouldn’t be able to kill 3 people so easily, But then again tell us how you would kill us ;D

item.title: Mw3? Cons and pros?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:126, topic:414519”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=516486.msg3758431#msg3758431 date=1316662567]

I enjoy quickscoping with my friends, playing search and destroy, and getting nukes. Bfbc is just giant maps running around looking for some1 going like 11 and 3 every game

Because kills are harder to come by and more strategic in BF, so when you get a kill its more rewarding. Better than COD racecart tag with guns and powerups

Not to mention one person can rush in and kill an entire squad so easily… no tactics needed… or skills… which is why the little kiddiez love it so much i guess
[/quote]
You act as if killing a squad irl would be a hard thing for one person to do.[/quote]
What I’m talking about is when they rush them and just knife the entire squad… especially with their that teleport h4x commando perk… if its still in black ops… yeah that usually doesn’t happen irl…

Read full topic
